mapper.select: SELECT ort.q_list_no, ort.id, ort.user_no, ort.board_category, ort.title, ort.content, ort.reg_date, ort.view_count FROM(SELECT rownum rn, ot.id, ot.q_list_no, ot.user_no, ot.board_category, ot.title, ot.content, ot.reg_date, ot.view_count FROM (SELECT u.id , q.q_list_no, q.user_no, q.board_category, q.title, q.content, q.reg_date, q.view_count FROM q_list q, users u where u.user_no = q.user_no and title like #{keyword} and board_category like #{boardCategory} ORDER BY reg_date)ot )ort where rn>=#{startRnum} and rn<=#{endRnum}

select u.id, q.user_no, q.q_list_no qListNo, q.board_category boardCategory, q.title, q.content, to_char(q.reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), q.view_count viewCount from users u, q_list q where u.user_no = q.user_no and q_list_no = #{no}

select u.id, q.user_no, q.q_list_no qListNo, q.board_category boardCategory, q.title, q.content, to_char(q.reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), q.view_count viewCount from users u, q_list q where u.user_no = q.user_no and q_list_no = #{no}
